body:
Hallo,


i am trying to run a simple room with including the following material:


*void BSDF winBSDF *


*6 0 tblindsBack.xml 0 0 1 . *


*0 *


*0*


*
*


*winBSDF polygon window *


*0 *


*0 *


*9 etc......*


and when I run ra in Terminal, i am getting the following:


*oconv: fatal - (material.rad): unknown type "BSDF"*




I guess the material bsdf is missing in my list, anyone can advise?


thx in advance




*N.Nassif


Lighting Designer***
